item.title: 12 Major health benefits of gac fruit

item.description:

item.title: 16 Amazing Health Benefits of Choke cherry
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description:
Chokecherries are delicious fruit that has many health benefits. They contain high levels of antioxidants, vitamins A, C, E, K, and B6, as well as minerals such as calcium, iron, magnesium, potassium, phosphorus, zinc, copper, manganese, selenium, and fluoride. Chokecherries also help prevent cancer, heart disease, diabetes, and Alzheimer’s disease. In fact, they may even… Read More »16 Amazing Health Benefits of Choke cherry

item.title: 12 Benefits of Sweet Potato: How To Cook, Recipes
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description:
Sweet potatoes are delicious, nutritious, and healthy. They’re also one of the most versatile vegetables around. They are loaded with nutrients such as vitamins A, C, B6, iron, potassium, fiber, and antioxidants. They’re low in calories and fat, making them perfect for weight loss. item.title: 10 Surprising Benefits of Eggplant For Anemia
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description:
Iron is an essential mineral that helps your body produce red blood cells. If you’re anemic, then you need to increase the amount of iron in your diet. One of the best ways to do this is by eating foods rich in iron. Eggplants are among those foods. They contain a lot of iron, as… Read More »10 Surprising Benefits of Eggplant For Anemia
